meanings.definition: A technique used in computer graphics to smooth jagged edges in images.
meanings.sent1: The antialiasing of the image made the edges look smoother.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often use antialiasing to improve the quality of images.
meanings.sent3: I tried to draw a pixelated heart, but the antialiasing turned it into a blob!
meanings.sent4: Her skillful use of antialiasing transformed the rough sketch into a polished masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The magic of antialiasing is like a digital eraser, smoothing out imperfections effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The process of reducing visual distortion in digital images.
meanings.sent1: Antialiasing helps to eliminate the pixelated look in digital pictures.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often rely on antialiasing to enhance the clarity of their photos.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally applied too much antialiasing, and now everything looks like a painting!
meanings.sent4: The effect of antialiasing on the image was like wearing glasses for the first time, everything became clear.
meanings.sent5: The power of antialiasing is like a magic wand, waving away any visual imperfections.
